snippet: Matt Lauer is filling in for Bob Costas, NBC’s longtime Olympic host, as he tries to get a painful and worsening eye infection under control.
abstract: Worsening eye infection forces Bob Costas to forgo hosting NBC's prime-time Olympics broadcast, as colleague Matt Lauer steps in.
lead_paragraph: Matt Lauer is filling in for Bob Costas, NBC’s longtime Olympic host, as he tries to get a painful and worsening eye infection under control.

headline.main: Eye Infection Forces Costas to Step Aside From Olympics Coverage
